com.barchart.feed.client.provider
Class BarchartFeedClientBase

java.lang.Object
  com.barchart.feed.client.provider.BarchartFeedClientBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
BarchartFeedClient, BarchartFeedReceiver
public abstract class BarchartFeedClientBase
extends Object

The entry point for Barchart data feed services.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shuts down the data feed and clears all registered market takers.

bindFeedStateListener

public void bindFeedStateListener(com.barchart.feed.client.api.FeedStateListener listener)
Applications which need to react to the connectivity state of the feed instantiate a FeedStateListener and bind it to the client.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to be bound.

bindTimestampListener

public void bindTimestampListener(com.barchart.feed.client.api.TimestampListener listener)
Applications which require time-stamp or heart-beat messages from the data server instantiate a DDF_TimestampListener and bind it to the client.

Parameters:
listener -

isTakerRegistered

public boolean isTakerRegistered(com.barchart.feed.base.market.api.MarketTaker<?> taker)
Adds a market taker to the client. This performs instrument registration with the market maker as well as subscribing to the required data from the feed.

Parameters:
taker - The market taker to be added.
Returns:
True if the taker was successfully added.

addTaker

public <V extends com.barchart.util.values.api.Value<V>> boolean addTaker(com.barchart.feed.base.market.api.MarketTaker<V> taker)
Adds a market taker to the client. This performs instrument registration with the market maker as well as subscribing to the required data from the feed.

Parameters:
taker - The market taker to be added.
Returns:
True if the taker was successfully added.

updateTaker

public <V extends com.barchart.util.values.api.Value<V>> boolean updateTaker(com.barchart.feed.base.market.api.MarketTaker<V> taker)
Updates a taker. This handles any instrument registration/unregistration needed with the feed client.

Parameters:
taker -
Returns:

removeTaker

public <V extends com.barchart.util.values.api.Value<V>> boolean removeTaker(com.barchart.feed.base.market.api.MarketTaker<V> taker)
Removes a market taker from the client. If no other takers require its instruments, they are unsubscribed from the feed.

Parameters:
taker - THe market taker to be removed.
Returns:
True if the taker was successfully removed.

lookup

public com.barchart.feed.base.instrument.values.MarketInstrument lookup(String symbol)
Retrieves the instrument object denoted by symbol. The local instrument cache will be checked first. If the instrument is not stored locally, a remote call to the instrument service is made.

Returns:
NULL_INSTRUMENT if the symbol is not resolved.

lookup

public List<com.barchart.feed.base.instrument.values.MarketInstrument> lookup(List<String> symbolList)
Retrieves a list of instrument objects denoted by symbols provided. The local instrument cache will be checked first. If any instruments are not stored locally, a remote call to the instrument service is made.

Returns:
An empty list if no symbols can be resolved.

take

public <S extends com.barchart.feed.base.instrument.values.MarketInstrument,V extends com.barchart.util.values.api.Value<V>> V take(S instrument,
                                                                                                                                    com.barchart.feed.base.market.enums.MarketField<V> field)
Makes a query to the market maker for a snapshot of a market field for a specific instrument. The returned values are frozen and disconnected from live market.

Returns:
NULL_VALUE for all fields if market is not present.
